scripts.template: cd games/template && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.jonas: cd games/jonas && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.mapgame: cd games/mapGame && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.build-all: npm run build-mapgame && npm run build-balloon && npm run build-imagepuzzle
scripts.build-mapgame: cd games/mapGame && npm i && parcel build ./index.html -d ../../dist/mapgame --public-url /mapgame/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-balloon: cd games/balloon && npm i && parcel build ./index.html -d ../../dist/balloon --public-url /balloon/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-imagepuzzle: cd games/imagePuzzle && npm i && parcel build ./index.html -d ../../dist/imagepuzzle --public-url /imagepuzzle/ && cd ../..
